Content.Name: Boise Service Missionaries
Content.Title: Boise Service Missionaries
Content.Abstract: A short biography and contact information for the Boise Service Missionaries.
Content.BodyCopy:
Kyle and Brittany Cooper are in the start of their lives. They were married in 2003 in the Oakland California Temple. They moved from Sacramento to Eagle, Idaho in 2004. They have two small daughters at home, ages 3 and 6, and are anxiously awaiting the arrival of the rest of their family here on earth. This family loves new adventures and making service as a part of their everyday life. As a family they love to be outdoors boating, biking, dirt-biking and all round having a fun time.

Kyle was born in 1979 and raised in Oakdale, California. After high school Kyle was a volunteer firefighter for 7 years and now volunteers with the Make-a-Wish foundation. He has a passion for service, learning, soccer, and creating a goal oriented life with his family. Kyle is an entrepreneur. He enjoys creating and building businesses. He is a commercial builder and a residential developer. He has recently co-founded the organization BucketListMatch.com. Kyle has served in the church in the Young Men, Scouting, Elders Quorum Presidency, and is currently serving in the Sunday School Presidency.

Brittany was born in 1983 in San Jose, California and moved throughout California. She completed a program in Massage Therapy while living in California and worked as a massage therapist through college. She graduated from Boise State University in Visual Arts in 2005. She has owned her own photography business and a boutique clothing store with her husband Kyle. She is currently a homemaker and loves to spend her time taking care of her family and home. She enjoys creating art, cooking, writing, being outdoors, reading and design. Brittany has served in the church in Young Women, Primary and Relief Society on the ward level. She is currently the Activity Days Leader in their ward.

Elder Kyle Cooper
Sister Brittany Cooper

581 N. Carswell
Star, ID 83669

Cell (Kyle): (208) 870-1943

boise@byui.edu
